name: Migblock
description:
What is Migblock?

Migblock is a rising community around a limitless Sandbox that is built by passion and not for profit.

Philosophically put; Migblock is an Escape; not from Reality, but to a Reality..

What can you do in Migblock?

Shortly; Anything. Since the game is predominantly a Sandbox the User can do anything they please. Build, Fight, Explore, Mine, Farm, Socialize, Relax and the list just goes on and on! 

Game-play

You will have the freedom to create worlds containing Procedurally Generated Landscapes, to venture into alone or with friends.

You, with or without your companions, can interact with the world with ease. Forge tools from an expansive Tech-Tree to make easy your tasks, build mighty Castles and Deep-Mines or Pretty Villas by the Sea or a Cabin in the woods.

If you can Dream it, you can create it, no matter how large or how small!

Why play Migblock?

Unlike other Sandbox Games, Migblock harshly emphasizes boundless creativity.

A perfect example of this would be the infinite worlds, with their limitless mining depths and construction heights, that Migblock holds for it's players. Where other Sandboxes limit your creations with boundaries, such as build limits, Migblock provides Next-Gen Technology to allow it's players a boundless, limitless freedom.

The tallest Digital towers and Deepest Underground Fortresses are found within Migblock.

[I'm serious there's no build limit]

So what are you waiting for?

Download the Launcher and get started Today!
